Content.Text:
<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is amazing! I can't believe this
was built by someone who isn't a
professional architect!

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a fine house. It's lovely!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you are clearly a genius when it
comes to building things. I'm quite
jealous!

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think you could build just about
anything, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow... now that's what I call a house.
Well done, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
With you here, <MYNAME>, I think the
restoration of this town is no longer a
dream. The future is going to be fun!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, everyone. You've been so much
help.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The house has been completed! Great
work, everyone. That's all for now!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>. I've still got some things
to explain to you.
<PAGE>
Shall we return to the farm?
